sentences.en: Christians preponderate in the population of that part of the country.
sentences.cn: 基督教徒在该国那一地区的人口中居多.

sentences.en: Ethnic Chinese preponderate in the population of Singapore.
sentences.cn: 在新加坡的人口中,华人居多数.

sentences.en: In balancing his faults with his perfections, the latter seemed rather to preponderate ( Henry Fielding )
sentences.cn: 平衡他的缺陷与才艺, 后者相对说来似乎是主要的 ( 亨利·菲尔丁 )

sentences.en: Oaks and maples preponderate in our woods.
sentences.cn: 在我们的森林中,橡树与枫树占多数.

sentences.en: The company is preponderate in industrial automation system design, construction and commissioning in electric and instrumentation.
sentences.cn: 公司在工业自动化系统设计 、 电气、仪表安装及系统调试方面具有很强的优势.

sentences.en: Therefore, shaping about innovation psychology should not preponderate over the principle with practice determining theory.
sentences.cn: 所以, 创新心理的形成不能超过实践决定论这一原则.

words.tran_cn: 占优势的；突出的；压倒性的
（在重量、数量、力量等方面）占优势

trans.tran_cn: 以重量胜过, 占优势, 超过, 胜过
trans.tran_en: to be more important or frequent than something else
